alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Fort Bend, southeastern Montgomery, west central Liberty and central Harris Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Porter Heights to near Pecan Grove. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Sugar Land, Stafford, Humble, Jersey Village, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Northside / Northline, Kingwood, Spring Branch North, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, Greater Heights, Mission Bend, Town West, Aldine, Memorial Park, Eldridge / West Oaks, Spring Branch West and Addicks Park Ten. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fort Bend; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty
